thread.title: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Newberry SC Offers Convenient Lodging for Newberry Invitational Volleyball Tournament
thread.title_full: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Newberry SC Offers Convenient Lodging for Newberry Invitational Volleyball Tournament - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Newberry SC Offers Convenient Lodging for Newberry Invitational Volleyball Tournament
text:
Holiday Inn Express & Suites Newberry, SC offers convenient lodging for guests attending the Newberry Invitational volleyball tournament on September 4-5, 2015.
 NEWBERRY, SC, September 01, The Holiday Inn Express & Suites Newberry South Carolina hotel offers convenient lodging for guests attending the Newberry Invitational volleyball tournament on September 4-5. The Newberry Wolves will host teams from UNC Pembroke, Lees McRae, Francis Marion, Belmont Abbey, and Mars Hill. Matches will take place in Eleazer Arena. The Holiday Inn Express & Suites is a proud sponsor of Newberry College athletics.
"We look forward to welcoming guests attending the Newberry Invitational volleyball tournament," explains Ambria Lanteigne, General Manager of the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Newberry. "We are located just minutes from the college campus and downtown Newberry," continues Ms. Lanteigne.
This hotel near Newberry College received the 2015 TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence Award. Non-smoking guest rooms feature free high speed Internet and comfortable Simply Smart beds. The in-room microwave and mini refrigerator will help travelers feel at home. King suites are available. Hotel amenities include a fitness center, business center, and 24-hour sundry shop for snacks and convenience items. The Express Start Breakfast Bar, with hot and cold favorites, is complimentary. The hotel is close to area attractions including Enoree River Winery, Carter & Holmes Orchids, and the historic Newberry Opera House.
Current lodging specials include the In-Room Pizza Package and the Romantic Escape Package, for those specials occasions. AAA and senior rates are available. IHG Rewards Club members will earn points for their stay. The Holiday Inn Express & Suites Newberry is located off I-26 at Exit 76.
For more information about the Newberry Invitational volleyball tournament, visit www.newberrywolves.com . To book your stay at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Newberry SC hotel , call 803-321-3955 or visit www.NEWBERRYSOUTHCAROLINAHOTEL.com .
About Holiday Inn Express & Suites Hotel Newberry
The Holiday Inn Express & Suites Hotel in Newberry is the premier choice among Newberry South Carolina hotels. They are conveniently located at exit 76 off of I-26, about 30 minutes north of Columbia and less than an hour south of Greenville, SC. This Newberry SC hotel has outstanding amenities, including an indoor pool, whirlpool and Fitness Center. Guest should be sure to stop by their complimentary Express Start Breakfast Bar each morning for delights like their signature cinnamon rolls and Smart Roast coffee. Few other Newberry South Carolina hotels can provide travelers with these perks backed by the reputable name they trust. "Stay Smart" at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Hotel.
For more information visit: http://www.NewberrySouthCarolinaHotel.com
For all media inquiries, please contact:
Allison Reinert
